Plot: A look at the lives of the strong-willed women of the Weston family, whose paths have diverged until a family crisis brings them back to the Oklahoma house they grew up in, and to the dysfunctional woman who raised them.
Title: August: Osage County
Actors: Meryl Streep, Julia Roberts, Chris Cooper, Ewan McGregor
tomatoConsensus: The sheer amount of acting going on in August: Osage County threatens to overwhelm, but when the actors involved are as talented as Meryl Streep and Julia Roberts, it's difficult to complain.
Awards: Nominated for 2 Oscars. Another 15 wins & 60 nominations.
